name: Rooster-Tail

ingredients.name: Peach brandy (not peach liqueur; may substitute 1.5 oz bonded applejack and .5 oz peach liqueur)

preparation:
This raspberry-and-mint tipple is delicious all year round.

Add all the ingredients to a shaker and fill with ice.

Shake, and strain into a small goblet filled with fresh cracked ice.

Garnish with a mint sprig and a raspberry or two.
